title: Mobile payments are down again.
body:
It gives me a generic error.
http://i.imgur.com/5UUqe81.png

replies.body: It also does that if you have bought RP to many times in one day.
Interesting.  I only buy RP once a month if that often though.  Kinda odd that it's down.
Okay, my statement is ruled out then lmao, I mean like too often as in 5 times in one day. Which I am ashamed to say I have done before.
Yea, I've logged relogged, and done a repair.  Nothing.
